Html: There are lots of good controls in the Silverlight Toolkit, would it be worth porting these into the WPF toolkit? Right now I'm thinking in particular of the Accordian control.

Hi, yes the intention is that eventually we will port most/all of the Silverlight Toolkit controls to WPF.  We don't have a set timeline for this yet, though.  If anyone has requests as to which controls you'd most like to see ported first, please let reply back here and we will compile a list. :-)

I would like to see all controls ported over of course, but the TimePicker, Accordion, TransitioningContent, DataForm and Pager would be a good start.  Also, a Docking control like third-parties have ( similar to Visual Studio IDE ) is a must!

Thanks.

Yes, please! Especially the following:

  • DateTimePicker or at least TimePicker
  • TransitioningContent
  • DataPager
  • DataForm
  • Rating
  • AutoCompleteBox
Don't forget about DataGridView.  Oh, and did I forget to mention a Docking control :)
The TimePicker control for Silverlight would be a great addition
